description:
'''Umberto Antonio Tozzi''' ({{IPA|it|umˈbɛrto anˈtɔːnjo ˈtɔttsi|pron}}; born 4 March 1952) is an Italian [[Pop music|pop]] and [[Rock music|rock]] singer and songwriter. Throughout his career, he has sold over 70 million records in different languages internationally, and his biggest international hits are:
"[[Stella Stai]]", "[[Gloria (Umberto Tozzi song)|Gloria]]", "[[Tu (Umberto Tozzi song)|Tu]]" and "[[Ti amo|Ti Amo]]".
